9 {
10  this->pose=tf::Pose(tf::createIdentityQuaternion(),tf::Vector3(0.0,0.0,0.0));
11  this->lin_vel=tf::Vector3(0.0,0.0,0.0);

24 Controller::Controller(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
25 {
26  this->nh_=nh;
27  this->enable_=false;
28 
29  ros::NodeHandle current_param("~/current");
30  ros::NodeHandle target_param("~/target");
31 
32  int current_type=InputTypes::NO_TYPE;
33  if(!current_param.getParam("input_type",current_type))
34  {
35  throw NecessaryParamException(current_param.resolveName("input_type"));
36  }
37  int target_type=InputTypes::NO_TYPE;
38  if(!target_param.getParam("input_type",target_type))
39  {
40  throw NecessaryParamException(target_param.resolveName("input_type"));
41  }
42  this->current_state_handler_=allocInput(InputTypes(current_type),current_param);
43  this->target_state_handler_=allocInput(InputTypes(target_type),target_param);
44 
45 
46 
47 
48  ros::NodeHandle priv("~");
49  float rate;
50  if(priv.getParam("rate",rate))
51  {
52  ROS_INFO("Setting control rate %lf",rate);
53  this->control_scope_timer_=this->nh_.createTimer(ros::Duration(1.0/rate),&Controller::controlScope,this);
54  }
55  else
56  {
57  throw NecessaryParamException(priv.resolveName("rate"));
58  }
59 
60 
61  std::string output_topic;
62  if(priv.getParam("topic_output",output_topic))
63  {
64  ROS_INFO("Advertising output at %s",this->nh_.resolveName(output_topic).c_str());
65  this->pub_=this->nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::TwistStamped>(output_topic,10);
66  }
67  else
68  {
69  throw NecessaryParamException(priv.resolveName("topic_output"));
70  }
71 
72  this->meta_=priv.advertise<multi_robot_msgs::MetaData>("meta_data",10);
73  this->enable_srv_=priv.advertiseService("enable_controller",&Controller::enableCallback,this);
74  this->disable_srv_=priv.advertiseService("disable_controller",&Controller::disableCallback,this);
75 }

79 }

81 std::unique_ptr<InputBase> Controller::allocInput(InputTypes type,ros::NodeHandle parameter)
82 {
83  switch(type)
84  {
85  case InputTypes::POSE_ODOM:
86  {
87  ROS_INFO("Allocing a pose+odom input!");
88  return std::make_unique<InputPoseOdom>(this->nh_,parameter);
89  }
90  case InputTypes::POSE_TWIST:
91  {
92  ROS_INFO("Allocing a pose+twist_global input!");
93  return std::make_unique<InputPoseTwist>(this->nh_,parameter);
94  }
95  case InputTypes::POSE_TWIST_LOCAL:
96  {
97  ROS_INFO("Allocing a pose+twist_local input!");
98  return std::make_unique<InputPoseTwistLocal>(this->nh_,parameter);
99  }
100  case InputTypes::SINGLE_ODOM:
101  {
102  ROS_INFO("Allocing a odom input!");
103  return std::make_unique<InputOdom>(this->nh_,parameter);
104  }
105 
106  case InputTypes::NO_TYPE:
107  default:
108  {
109  throw InputAllocException();
110  }
111  }
112 }
113 void Controller::controlScope(const ros::TimerEvent&)
114 {
115  //Get the current state from handler
116  this->current_state_=State( this->current_state_handler_->getPose(),
117  this->current_state_handler_->getLinVel(),
118  this->current_state_handler_->getAngVel());
119 
120  //Get the untransformed target state (leader state)
121  State leader( this->target_state_handler_->getPose(),
122  this->target_state_handler_->getLinVel(),
123  this->target_state_handler_->getAngVel());
124 
125 
126  //Update the state of rigid motion
127  this->rigid_motion_.updateInputState( leader.pose,
128  leader.lin_vel,
129  leader.ang_vel,
130  this->target_state_handler_->getTime().toSec());
131 
132  Eigen::Vector3d state_vector=rigid_motion_.getState();
133  Eigen::Vector3d d_state_vector=rigid_motion_.getDiffState();
134 
135  //Rewrite the states into the state definitions of the controller
136  this->target_state_=State(tf::Pose(tf::createQuaternionFromYaw(state_vector(2)),tf::Vector3(state_vector(0),state_vector(1),0.0)),
137  tf::Vector3(d_state_vector(0),d_state_vector(1),0.0),
138  tf::Vector3(0.0,0.0,d_state_vector(2)));
139 
140  this->control_=this->calcControl(this->current_state_,this->target_state_);
141  //Execute the calculations from derived classes
142  this->publish();
143 }
144 
145 void Controller::publish()
146 {
147  //Publish control command
148  if(this->enable_)
149  {
150  geometry_msgs::TwistStamped twist;
151  twist.twist.linear.x=this->control_.v;
152  twist.twist.angular.z=this->control_.omega;
153  this->pub_.publish(twist);
154  }
155  //publish Metadata
156  this->publishMetaData();
157 
158 }
159 
160 void Controller::publishMetaData()
161 {
162  multi_robot_msgs::State current_state_msg;
163  tf::poseTFToMsg(this->current_state_.pose,current_state_msg.pose.pose);
164  // current_state_msg.pose.header.stamp=this->current_state_handler_->getTime();
165  current_state_msg.pose.header.stamp=ros::Time::now();
166  tf::vector3TFToMsg(this->current_state_.lin_vel,current_state_msg.lin_vel);
167  tf::vector3TFToMsg(this->current_state_.ang_vel,current_state_msg.ang_vel);
168  current_state_msg.angle=tf::getYaw(this->current_state_.pose.getRotation());
169 
170  multi_robot_msgs::State target_state_msg;
171  tf::poseTFToMsg(this->target_state_.pose,target_state_msg.pose.pose);
172  // target_state_msg.pose.header.stamp=this->target_state_handler_->getTime();
173  target_state_msg.pose.header.stamp=ros::Time::now();
174  tf::vector3TFToMsg(this->target_state_.lin_vel,target_state_msg.lin_vel);
175  tf::vector3TFToMsg(this->target_state_.ang_vel,target_state_msg.ang_vel);
176  target_state_msg.angle=tf::getYaw(this->target_state_.pose.getRotation());
177 
178 
179  multi_robot_msgs::State diff_msg;
180  tf::poseTFToMsg(this->control_diff_.pose,diff_msg.pose.pose);
181  // target_state_msg.pose.header.stamp=ros::Time((this->target_state_handler_->getTime()-this->current_state_handler_->getTime()).toSec());
182  tf::vector3TFToMsg(this->control_diff_.lin_vel,diff_msg.lin_vel);
183  tf::vector3TFToMsg(this->control_diff_.ang_vel,diff_msg.ang_vel);
184  diff_msg.angle=tf::getYaw(this->control_diff_.pose.getRotation());
185 
186 
187  multi_robot_msgs::MetaData msg;
188  msg.current=current_state_msg;
189  msg.target=target_state_msg;
190  msg.diff=diff_msg;
191 
192 
193  this->meta_.publish(msg);
194 }

196 bool Controller::enableCallback(std_srvs::EmptyRequest &req,std_srvs::EmptyRequest &res)
197 {
198  this->enable_=true;
199  return true;
200 }
201 bool Controller::disableCallback(std_srvs::EmptyRequest &req,std_srvs::EmptyRequest &res)
202 {
203  this->enable_=false;
204  return true;
205 }
